Source.Name: riot
Source.Summary: Electron based Matrix client built using the Matrix React SDK
Source.Description: Riot is an electron based Matrix client that allows cross platform communication between other IRC, slack, gitter and other riot/matrix users. Also has secure end to end encrypted group(or 1 to 1) chat through text, audio and video with other users of riot/matrix on Android, iOS, Windows, OSX, Linux and/or web browsers.
